channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiTokenAndroid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiTokenAndroid

item.title: CVE-2021-44166|2024-08-04T04:17:24.370Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortitokenandroid
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability [CWE-284 ] in FortiToken Mobile (Android) external push notification 5.1.0 and below may allow a remote attacker having already obtained a user's password to access the protected system during the 2FA procedure, even though the deny button is clicked by the legitimate user.
